Rule.Name: f2013MSI
Rule.Query: $n4DigitSKUVersion='2013' and $.='MSI'

Rule.Name: sExcelCrashFound1415
Rule.Query: ($n2DigitVersion=14 or $n2DigitVersion=15) and $nCrashCount!=0
Rule.Title: One or more crashing events for Excel found in the Application Event log
Rule.Text:
At least one crashing event for Excel was found in the Application Event log. To possibly address this issue, we recommend you check your scan results for known crashing issues and resolve any that are found. If Excel continues to crash:
1. Make sure Excel is up-to-date (check your OffCAT report). 2. Try disabling COM add-ins
Click the 'Tell me more...' link for additional troubleshooting techniques.
